body:
@mewmewkissycutie ran +Satanism and was allied with +LGBT causes on Ruqqus. A controversial figure, Civil fought for non-traditional usership on Ruqqus. At 6:52 last night, one of her battles with more conservative users spiraled into claims of harassment, then legal threats, leading to her tragic demise. Her battles are now ended. She rests here, interred under flowers.

**Important Note:** This guild is a space of peaceful, solemn reflection. *De mortuis nihil nisi bonum* — do not speak ill of the dead. You may deliver criticism of Civil on the level of "I come to bury Caesar, not to praise him", but please be respectful on mourners, limiting any open mockery.

body:
Oh fuck i'm so sorry. I am the guy at the start with the positive joke. I didn't mean it in a bad way, i was just making a bad joke. I feel really bad that civil got it in the wrong way because she was one of the more fun people in the discord server.
I'm so sorry civil

I also want to add that she probably thought that i was someone else because i've never done anything that she said

author.bio: 12/08/2021 The administrators are no longer committed to free speech on this website, but they will continue to develop the software so that anyone who is interested in hosting a free speech website can do so. Rest in peace, Ruqqus. It was nice.

body:
So what you're saying is that I'm not the only victim of abuse by @AngstKitten.

Damn... I never liked Civil but I like AngstKitten even less, and it's a shame to know she continues to abuse her illegitimate powers.

The retards who downvoted this must really like jannie abuse. Go suck up to those R\*ddit mods you love so much.
